    • setModal

      public void setModal​(boolean toLeader, CounterTop leaderDeposit, ClientDashboardController clientDashboard, javafx.stage.Stage modal, int leaderPosition)
      Set a modal asking the number of resources a player wants to move to/from a leader.
      Overrides:
      setModal in class GuiController
      Parameters:
      toLeader - true if moving TO a leader
      leaderDeposit - the interested leader deposit
      clientDashboard - the clientDashboardController who called the modal
      modal - the modal created and called
      leaderPosition - position of the leader card

    • confirmClick

      Called after clicking 1 or 2 in the askResourcesToMove Modal either send a message or set the clientDashboardController params for the leaderMove
      Parameters:
      numSelected - number of selected resources
